title: Hacked
body: I was hacked because I was stupid. i gave my information to a site and was promptly hacked. They have changed the email, password, and probably the username. The email that I signed up with is not receiving anything, and I fear it may be too late. for some reason, my account is still logged into this website, but I can't change anything due to everything being changed. I have already filled out the forms that Riot provides. I hope something can be done about this because I spent lots of money on this game and have played it for four years. I know it is all my fault and that Riot has provided many warnings about this. :( I'm still really sad though.

replies.body:
No worries bud! You mentioned already having a ticket open, so just do your best on answering as many questions as you can. Even if you aren't 100% about an answer, try to get as close as you can because the more questions answered the more likely you are to get verified as the original owner.

As a side note: if you still aren't getting responses to your ticket, try shooting us another ticket while *not* logged in. That should guarantee you get a response to the email you provide.

This is timsterMan1337. I followed your advice and logged out and sent another ticket. Because I logged out, I cannot log back in anymore (due to the password being changed). I am using my brother's account to leave this comment. Thank you so much for the quick response. To verify that this is me, the email that I used for the new ticket is teemoshroomsftw@gmail.com. Also, is the automatic LeagueOfLegendsSupportZendesk email that comes after the ticket is sent come instantly or after some time. I may have accidentally forgot the "s" after "shrooms" while inputting my email into the ticket form. I have not recieved any emails yet, so if the Zendesk email comes instantly after the ticket, that means I did input the email incorrectly.
No worries! I see your ticket in the queue, and it might be a little bit before you get a response, but rest easy knowing we'll be able to help once those agents get to your ticket!
